thread.title: Leading players in the youth, student and educational travel industry celebrated at the Global Youth Travel Awards 2015Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Leading players in the youth, student and educational travel industry celebrated at the Global Youth Travel Awards 2015Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Leading players in the youth, student and educational travel industry celebrated at the Global Youth Travel Awards 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Leading players in the youth, student and educational travel industry celebrated at the Global Youth Travel Awards 2015 Published on : Saturday, September 26, 2015
The winners of the Global Youth Travel Awards 2015 – sponsored by Else Globe – were announced in Cape Town tonight during the concluding event of this year’s World Youth and Student Travel Conference – WYSTC 2015.
Having drawn an impressive number of nominations and votes, the award categories celebrate the outstanding performers within the youth, student and educational travel industry and act as a benchmark for excellence within this fast-growing sector.
David Chapman, Director General of WYSE Travel Confederation, which coordinates the awards, said: “The calibre of nominations this year across all award categories has been truly outstanding.
“As youth travel blossoms into the tourism industry’s fastest growing segment, representing approximately 23% of international tourist arrivals, it’s important to acknowledge the wealth of talent and innovation from the companies as well as individuals driving this growth.”
